statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} 3 \\ 0 \\ 2 \\ 1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 2 \\ -2 \\ -2 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -13 \\ 10 \\ 8 \\ 19 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 42 \\ -30 \\ -22 \\ -56 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -3 \\ 2 \\ -1 \\ 0 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 3 \\ -1 \\ -4 \\ 2 \end{array}\right]\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
